Package it.polimi.ingsw.util.json

Class DecoratedJsonArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.util.json.DecoratedJsonArray
  • public class DecoratedJsonArray
extends java.lang.Object
    A DecoratedJsonArray is a wrapper class that encapsulates a JSONArray, which is a collection of JSONObjects, and decorates it with methods.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private org.json.simple.JSONArray content
      The JSONArray represented by the instance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DecoratedJsonArray​(java.util.List<DecoratedJsonObject> content, java.lang.Object uselessObject)
      This constructor builds a DecoratedJsonArray from a list of DecoratedJsonObjects.
      DecoratedJsonArray​(org.json.simple.JSONArray jsonArray)
      This constructor creates a new DecoratedJsonArray by wrapping an already existing JSONArray.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DecoratedJsonObject get​(int index)
      Returns a DecoratedJsonObject wrapping the JSONObject contained in the JSONArray wrapped by this, at a specified position.
      java.util.List<DecoratedJsonObject> toList()
      Separates all the items contained in the JSONArray wrapped by the instance and returns them in a List.
      (package private) org.json.simple.JSONArray unpack()
      Returns the wrapped JSONArray.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • content

        private org.json.simple.JSONArray content
        The JSONArray represented by the instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DecoratedJsonArray

        public DecoratedJsonArray​(java.util.List<DecoratedJsonObject> content,
                          java.lang.Object uselessObject)
        This constructor builds a DecoratedJsonArray from a list of DecoratedJsonObjects.
        Parameters:
        content - the list.
        uselessObject - this parameter is added to the signature of this method in order to allow the DecoratedJsonObject.getArray(String) method to distinguish the two constructors of this class. Not including it would not have allowed the program to build. This parameter should always be set to null, otherwise a JsonException will be thrown.

      • DecoratedJsonArray

        DecoratedJsonArray​(org.json.simple.JSONArray jsonArray)
        This constructor creates a new DecoratedJsonArray by wrapping an already existing JSONArray.
        Parameters:
        jsonArray - the JSONArray.

    • Method Detail

      • unpack

        org.json.simple.JSONArray unpack()
        Returns the wrapped JSONArray.
        Returns:
        the wrapped JSONArray.

      • get

        public DecoratedJsonObject get​(int index)
        Returns a DecoratedJsonObject wrapping the JSONObject contained in the JSONArray wrapped by this, at a specified position.
        Parameters:
        index - the position.
        Returns:
        the DecoratedJsonObject.

      • toList

        public java.util.List<DecoratedJsonObject> toList()
        Separates all the items contained in the JSONArray wrapped by the instance and returns them in a List.
        Returns:
        the List.
